altTitles.ja: ドリームキャストファン烈伝
コミック・ワンダーランド DCファン列伝

description.en: The Dream Cast! It's a masterpiece of a home-use game machine created by SEGA, the strongest game maker! Despite managing director Yukawa's desperate sales efforts, the tragic masterpiece game hardware disappeared in the home video game machine sales war! But we know its high performance! And we know how interesting the released Dream Cast game software is! You and I know! And I also know the main character of this book, Yasushiro Doriki! "Doriki Yasushiro", who calls himself the second of "Segata Sanshiro", fights! Fight with the pride of Dream Cast fans! This book is a daily war chronicle depicting the daily battles of Dream Cast Fans! The joy of the Dream Cast controller talking to you! Fight against parental control of erotic regulations! Witness the moment the SEGA provider becomes charged! Advanced grand strategy DC version! Heavy visual memory, Puropuru Pack has the same special training effect as Power List! It's my fault that all the heroines in Sentimental Graffiti 2 have lost weight! Smell it out, Dreamcast exhaust smell! "Let's make SEGA" Sega Tsuku! Announcement of the decision to stop the production of the Dreamcast! Sakura Wars 3 is now on sale! Sakura Wars Drama Download! Dorika Robo! Rubble Party! Tzimad Front! Dreamcast specialty game magazine "Dreamcast Magazine" has been renewed into a "comprehensive magazine"! Too much fun Sakura Wars Online Special Mahjong! The joy of Ayanami Raising Project Dream Cast porting! Sakura Wars 4 now on sale! Serialized in "Dreamcast Magazine" magazine, the first book of a manga that follows the emotions of Dreamcast fans in real time! Please take a look!
